languages.text: {n}Вы наклоняетесь к мертвой женщине. Причина смерти ясна — жизнь Вольного Торговца оборвал выстрел из автопистолета, причем необычайно меткий. На застывшем лице Теодоры запечатлелось изумление — последняя эмоция, испытанная ей при жизни.{/n}

{n}You lean closer to the body. The cause of death is apparent: the Rogue Trader's life was ended by an autopistol shot, an extraordinarily accurate one at that. Theodora's face bears an expression of surprise — the last emotion she experienced in life.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы наклоняетесь к мертвой женщине. Причина смерти ясна — жизнь Вольного Торговца оборвал выстрел из болтера, причем необычайно меткий. На застывшем лице Теодоры запечатлелось изумление — последняя эмоция, испытанная ей при жизни.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You lean closer to the body. The cause of death is apparent: what ended the Rogue Trader's life was a bolter shot, an extraordinarily accurate one at that. Theodora's face bears an expression of surprise — the last emotion she experienced in life.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你凑近尸体。西奥多拉的死因显而易见，她的生命被一发自动手枪的子弹带走了，而且这一枪无比精确。西奥多拉脸上挂着惊讶的表情，这便是她生前最后一刻感受到的情绪。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean closer to the body. The cause of death is apparent: the Rogue Trader's life was ended by an autopistol shot, an extraordinarily accurate one at that. Theodora's face bears an expression of surprise — the last emotion she experienced in life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你凑近尸体。西奥多拉的死因显而易见，她的生命被一发自动手枪的子弹带走了，而且这一枪无比精确。西奥多拉脸上挂着惊讶的表情，这便是她生前最后一刻感受到的情绪。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Te acercas más al cadáver. La causa de la muerte es evidente: la vida de la Comerciante Independiente fue segada por un disparo de pistola automática increíblemente preciso. La cara de Theodora refleja una gran sorpresa, la última emoción que sintió en vida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean closer to the body. The cause of death is apparent: the Rogue Trader's life was ended by an autopistol shot, an extraordinarily accurate one at that. Theodora's face bears an expression of surprise — the last emotion she experienced in life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Te acercas más al cadáver. La causa de la muerte es evidente: la vida de la Comerciante Independiente fue segada por un disparo de pistola automática increíblemente preciso. La cara de Theodora refleja una gran sorpresa, la última emoción que sintió en vida.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは死体に身を乗り出す。死因は明らかだ。自由開拓者の命を絶ったのはオートピストルの銃弾であり、その精度は極めて高かった。シオドーラの顔には驚きの表情が浮かんでいる。それは彼女が人生で経験した最後の味わった感情だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean closer to the body. The cause of death is apparent: what ended the Rogue Trader's life was an autopistol shot, an extraordinarily accurate one at that. Theodora's face bears an expression of surprise — the last emotion she experienced in life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは死体に身を乗り出す。死因は明らかだ。自由開拓者の命を絶ったのはオートピストルの銃弾であり、その精度は極めて高かった。テオドラの顔には驚きの表情が浮かんでいる。彼女が人生で経験した最後の感情だ。{/n}
{n}あなたは死体に身を乗り出す。死因は明らかだ。自由開拓者の命を絶ったのはオートピストルの銃弾であり、その精度は極めて高かった。シオドーラの顔には驚きの表情が浮かんでいる。それは彼女が人生で経験した最後の味わった感情だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous vous penchez sur le corps. La cause de la mort est évidente : c'est un tir de pistolet-mitrailleur qui a tué la libre-marchande, un tir extraordinairement précis de surcroît. Le visage de Théodora affiche une expression de surprise, la dernière émotion qu'elle aura éprouvée dans sa vie.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean closer to the body. The cause of death is apparent: the Rogue Trader's life was ended by an autopistol shot, an extraordinarily accurate one at that. Theodora's face bears an expression of surprise — the last emotion she experienced in life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous vous penchez sur le corps. La cause de la mort est évidente : c'est un tir de pistolet-mitrailleur qui a tué la libre-marchande, un tir extraordinairement précis de surcroît. Le visage de Théodora affiche une expression de surprise, la dernière émotion qu'elle aura éprouvée dans sa vie.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du beugst dich näher über die Leiche. Die Todesursache ist offensichtlich: Ein ausgesprochen präziser Schuss einer Maschinenpistole hat das Leben der Freihändlerin beendet. Theodoras Gesichtsausdruck wirkt überrascht – die letzte Emotion ihres Lebens.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean closer to the body. The cause of death is apparent: the Rogue Trader's life was ended by an autopistol shot, an extraordinarily accurate one at that. Theodora's face bears an expression of surprise — the last emotion she experienced in life.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du beugst dich näher über die Leiche. Die Todesursache ist offensichtlich: Ein ausgesprochen präziser Schuss einer Maschinenpistole hat das Leben der Freihändlerin beendet. Theodoras Gesichtsausdruck wirkt überrascht – die letzte Emotion ihres Lebens.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cesede doğru eğiliyorsun. Ölüm sebebi aşikâr: Ototabancayla yapılan olağanüstü isabetli bir atış, Hür Tacir'in canını almış. Theodora'nın yüzüne bir şaşkınlık ifadesi yerleşip kalmış. Hayattayken yaşadığı son duygu bu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You lean closer to the body. The cause of death is apparent: the Rogue Trader's life was ended by an autopistol shot, an extraordinarily accurate one at that. Theodora's face bears an expression of surprise — the last emotion she experienced in life.{/n}
